mapper.insert: insert into SUPPLIES_INFO (ID, SUPPLIES_NAME, SUPPLIES_NO, EXPERIMENTAL_STAGE, SUPPLIES_BRAND, SUPPLIES_MODEL, SUPPLIES_PRICE, SUPPLIES_FIRM, REMARK, CREATE_PERSON, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, ORG_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suppliesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suppliesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{experimentalStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suppliesBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suppliesModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suppliesPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suppliesFirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update SUPPLIES_INFO set SUPPLIES_NAME = #{suppliesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIES_NO = #{suppliesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPERIMENTAL_STAGE = #{experimentalStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIES_BRAND = #{suppliesBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIES_MODEL = #{suppliesModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIES_PRICE = #{suppliesPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIES_FIRM = #{suppliesFirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SUPPLIES_NAME, SUPPLIES_NO, EXPERIMENTAL_STAGE, SUPPLIES_BRAND, SUPPLIES_MODEL, SUPPLIES_PRICE, SUPPLIES_FIRM, REMARK, CREATE_PERSON, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, ORG_ID from SUPPLIES_INFO where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, SUPPLIES_NAME, SUPPLIES_NO, EXPERIMENTAL_STAGE, SUPPLIES_BRAND, SUPPLIES_MODEL, SUPPLIES_PRICE, SUPPLIES_FIRM, REMARK, CREATE_PERSON, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, ORG_ID from SUPPLIES_INFO

select * from SUPPLIES_INFO
order by SUPPLIES_NAME desc
